Project Name: Antiphonarium et hymnarium secundum morem Sanctae Romanae Ecclesiae
Title: Antiphonarium et hymnarium secundum morem Sanctae Romanae Ecclesiae Collection
Description.note: This collection includes an original manuscript of a score for an antiphonal hymn. Features a preface by Mattheum de Schiavo, addressed to Dominico Falesio, protonotario apostolico of Calabria, and parish priest of the Chiesa Santa Anna di Palazzo in Naples.

Project Name: Antiphonarium et hymnarium secundum morem Sanctae Romanae Ecclesiae
